entry.title: WIND WARNING, Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 p.m. EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
